screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .puppet file in Adobe Character Animator 2023
screenshot.caption: PUPPET file open in Adobe Character Animator 2023

description: Character Animator is an Adobe Creative Cloud (CC) application that enables you to animate characters based on your movements and templates included with the software. You can also import designs created in other Adobe CC apps, such as Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator .

You can export puppets as PUPPET files with Character Animator and share them with other Character Animator users, who can then import the puppets into their scenes. To create a PUPPET file in Adobe Character Animator, select File → Export... → Puppet... .

images.alt: Screenshot of a .puppet file in Adobe Character Animator 2023
images.caption: PUPPET file open in Adobe Character Animator 2023
